title: tattooism
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013125118im_/http:/typophile.com/files/amareburgues_5916.jpg)

Since I was 20 (15 years ago) I am thinking about doing a tattoo over my skin. [Veer's The Skinny blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013125118/http:/blog.veer.com/archives/001705.html#commentola) received a amazing use of [Burgues Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013125118/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000267) . Maybe some day I ll do the same. I have the fonts, now I need the courage!
author: Ale Paul

comments.content: I will take you to get a tattoo, Ale. I know a guy :)
